title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 456.2 - Information and resource referral system (IRRS)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 456.2 - Information and resource referral system (IRRS)

State Regulations
(a) Each local social services department
shall assign personnel with appropriate qualifications and in sufficient
numbers to implement, operate and monitor the information and referral
services. (b) Each local social
services department shall install and maintain a compendium of local community
resources, updated annually, to facilitate the use of information and referral
activities in the manner prescribed by the State Department of Social

Services. (c) To insure that
services are received, each local social services department shall make
follow-up efforts, where appropriate, with the individual or family, or with
the community agency or facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
456.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
